messages.body: $POL The business is cash rich and poised for success
$SRNE beating myself up over not throwing my money in $POL last night.. Felt it maybe a sympathy play due to other ev stocks smh it jumped 2.14 to 5 overnight
Double Top Signal Alert: $POL. More insights: https://stockinvest.us/technical-analysis/POL?utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=autopost

Specialty inks created by OTC-listed $NNUP (Nocopi Tech  https://nocopi.com/) are the secret sauce in children's activity / coloring books featured in recent #ryansworld video here https://bit.ly/3ibM2b2 $NGVT $POL $SCHL

links.title: Nocopi Technologies, Inc. | Simple and Secure
links.description: Nocopi develops and markets specialty reactive inks for unique, mess-free applications in the toy and educational product markets. Nocopi also develops and markets product authentication technologies designed to combat product counterfeiting and/or unauthorized product diversion. Nocopi derives revenue from technology licensing agreements as well as from the sale of its proprietary inks to licensees and/or their licensed printers.

links.title: Ryan's World Road Trip Blind Bag and Imagine ink
